title: I see the same shit every day on this forum, "Cannot climb out of Bronze"
body:
Some of those players claim to be and are proven to be Gold or better in previous seasons, even some Platinum players are here saying they cannot climb out of bronze, even some CURRENT Platinum players who make a new account are stuck in Bronze.

And I am one of them. Once upon a time I did make it past Gold, now I am lucky to not be dropped out of Silver 5. Even last season with some 20 games played I made it into Silver, this season with 146 games I am on 15 LP in Silver 5.

I come here trying to tell everyone how bad it is for the Solo, or minimal premade teams, yet players don't want to listen, why? The only major change this season is the dynamic queue, everything else is quite the same other than the extra number of small premade teams who can't play.

Matchmaking hasn't changed, there should be no reason from one season to the next that the game is this impossible for a solo player to gain any rank. I will say again, PLATINUM players are having issues getting out of Bronze.

I haven't changed how I play and it has always worked in the past, why now does my play style and skill level all of a sudden determine that I am no better than Bronze after 5 years?

replies.body:
What account were you gold on? I checked OP.GG and you were Silver 5 last year as well?

+ I'd recommend you play a bit more {{champion:86}} **Garen** BTW, he was one of your mains last year and you have a great winrate on him. 

+ Also  {{champion:17}} **Teemo** was one of your old mains as well, and he's actually better this season than last. You might want to consider getting back into him as well.

When you have a less than 50% winrate over 50+ games on a champion, it's usually a good sign to switch it up a bit. It kinda happened to me on **Thresh** last season and I managed to climb a few more ranks by dropping him.
Dont tell him to play Garen and Teemo O_O we don't need more of that pollution.

_"Elo hell is dark place. Embrace the corruption or be consumed by it."_

http://pre04.deviantart.net/822b/th/pre/i/2013/307/1/4/teemo_doll_by_mess_anime_artist-d6syiv3.jpg
i will legitimately have nightmares now.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ouMmAgVI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-23T07:43:05.308+0000)
>
> Dont tell him to play Garen and Teemo O_O we don't need more of that pollution.

Yeah. Last thing I need is for people to be picking my Teemo. 

https://i.gyazo.com/c847ebc2f53476ba7ade61e5d36069c8.png

It was this same account I got gold a few season ago, and that was with Teemo top lane. Last season I had like 20 games and managed to get Silver much faster than my 150 or something games this season.

Why can't people understand - IT HAS NEVER BEEN THIS BAD! This season has never been as bad as any other season I have ever been in. I don't know how else to say it, EVERY OTHER SEASON HAS BEEN 100% BETTER WITH MATCHMAKING!

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/412ndo/pro_players_are_mocking_dynamic_queue_system_on/
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/jcANJwq0-dynamic-queue-is-the-best-thing-riot-have-come-up-with
https://www.unrankedsmurfs.com/blog/why-dynamic-queue-sucks
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/412xvl/new_draftpick_dynamic_queue_feedback_megathread/

I can go on? I have NEVER seen this much hate for this game or the ranking system since, well, ever.

Despite what most people think, **Riot** usually makes the right call on stuff like this. Not this time though IMO.

+ I think **gbay99** is spot on [here](https://youtu.be/10OhZAobVdY?t=7m17s) on why **Riot** is so stubborn about taking down/reworking Dynamic Queue. His videos on DQ in general are a great watch. He was on the round table discussion and understands the issue better than most.

Either way, it seems like we're slowly working towards some kind of solution right now. We just need to keep respectfully letting **Riot** know that we don't want this.

I will keep trying, for as long as I still have an account.

The issue, Riot refuse to listen to anyone but the top % of players, that is fact. They made this dynamic queue change based on the top <1% of players. 

There are 1.6 million NA players, another issue in itself that there are only 200K OCE players, making our match ups that much worse. 3 million worldwide, this means they are listening to only 30K players AT MOST in making this decision, that is nowhere near enough of a capture in making their decisions for 100% of the player base.

Just think about it, I had no issues in previous seasons, I won some, I lost some, I had team mates AT MY SKILL LEVEL more often than not. Now thanks to 30,000 out of 3,000,000 players, my life got turned upside down. Instead of making a change that affects 2,700,000 players, change how Diamond and above works and leave the rest, or change how Platinum and below work to suit the majority of players.

Two different match making rules dependant on your rank, it can work.
lol im plat 2 and smurf in bronze/silver all the time. Pretty easy to win tbh. Thats as a jungle main tho

Maybe it's easy because you are better than them?

Skill is comparative, bronze players are shit to you but not shit to other bronze players, because they are all comparatively "bad" to you. Therefore most people in bronze are mostly around the same skill level.

In contrast, you going into bronze with higher level mechanics and most of the time better game knowledge, of course it'll be an easy win. Does that mean for bronze players it is easy to get out of bronze? No. Does it mean bronze players are bad? Yes.

If these players (not you) are truly platinum level then they will be platinum. If they can't get out of bronze, it is not the fault of dynamic queue. Maybe they are better individual players than bronze players, but if they aren't premade with a team then they lose so much strength.

League is a team game, and always will be as far as I am concerned. That is exactly why SKT doesn't win every worlds. By far they are the best team there, and Faker is pretty much the grandmaster of league, but team plays can easily overcome this, especially situational ones in games.

If league was 1v1, Faker would probably be off and on top of the ladder. Same with other highly regarded professionals.

People need to realize that dynamic queue didn't create the problem of matching good "teams" with good "solo" queuers. It merely organized premades. Before dynamic queue, there was still a good number of teams that cursed, or just had really good coordination giving them an edge.

Players who do not utilize dynamic queue but then complain about "unfair" team matches, are good solo players, but they just aren't good team players. And this isn't Riot's fault. It's theirs.

Sidenote:

None of the above argument was directed at you. 

You shouldn't be smurfing in bronze or silver because if you are Plat 2, then you aren't improving down here. You could easily get Diamond and higher if you worked at it. So go for gold! Err... I mean go for diamond.

One, the number of people I have seen who said Bronze is easy.

I am seeing more say this dynamic queue is bad than good.

I think the main problem I've seen and experienced is that because this is well and truly a TEAM game 90% of the time you WILL need to rely on your teammates to do something in order to win the game. It's because of this that when you need to rely on your jg to gank in order to get ahead or you really need that drag buff but your team isn't responding, people just tilt and lose. I see the reason for dynamic queue with Riot trying to encourage more premades and less soloing because it well and truly doesn't work out most of time with the basis of the game. When your playing League by yourself you feel like you truly are "stuck behind a screen" playing with these "virtual teammates" whereas when your actually engaging with the people your playing with you really do feel like your all together as a team.

They can't have DQ without solos though.  So what you are saying is false.  They are trying to cater to the SMALL portion of people who cried about not being able to rank queue with their friends, while knowing full well and REQUIRING that people play solo in order to get their DQ to work.  If there were no solo players the DQ would not work.  Riot knows that.  They are also very aware that playing solo in the DQ environment is unfair.  Whether they do something to fix that or not is the thing that remains to be seen, although their introduction of a shitty banner for solo players is kind of a sign that although they know the problem exists they don't understand it.

It is an easy fix, if they bother to listen to the community. I don't know why they don't listen. All they want to do is cater to the top tier players, as in, the top 1% or less.

Implement a system that allows players to have a personal scoring system. Not only will this allow those who actually know how to play but lose to gain a positive LP, it stops those who are being carried to a certain point and ruining the game from getting there.

I.E. If a Silver player is carried to Diamond, but at best is a Gold level player, he will suck ass at Diamond and end up killing the game for those at that level. On the flip side, if you are actually a Gold level player but are stuck with those in Silver due to being solo, you can at least get some LP in the lost games and climb to your actual rank.

You don't always drop rank when you lose on zero LP is also another major issue, those who are carried can stay at that level forever as long as they win at least one game before the demotion takes place and just keep ruining the game for those around them due to being carried.

If Riot want to keep pushing the Dynamic queue they can at least implement an in-game chat system to allow us to feel like we are actually all human and working together.

Currently you are spot on, you feel like, nothing. It feels just like playing with bots some times, they simply won't listen, much like your 'team' when you go in solo.

Time again I constantly get a team who just rants on and refuses to do anything and inevitably lose the game.
my biggest issue with the current rank system is im not getting any of the roles that i know i can go ok with. even though im constantly putting jungle as my main it autofills to shit
